docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: High homicide rates, AIDS and lack of medical care are continuing to cut short the lives of black Americans, while the health of whites is improving, the Federal Government said today.

headline.main: Health Data Show Wide Gap Between Whites and Blacks

docs.snippet: LEAD: High homicide rates, AIDS and lack of medical care are continuing to cut short the lives of black Americans, while the health of whites is improving, the Federal Government said today.
